settings.question: Is there a minimum purchase amount for financing?
settings.answer: Certainly, financing is possible if the purchase is above, or at least, $500.

settings.question: Can I pay off my balance early?
settings.answer: Of course! There are no penalties, and fees on settling your balance ahead of time.

settings.question: What happens if I miss a payment?
settings.answer: Our advice is to speak with the financing company as soon as possible to prevent incurring any penalties.

settings.question: Can I finance custom jewelry?
settings.answer: Of course, with our financing policies, all types of jewelry, including customized and lab-grown diamond jewelry, can be financed.

settings.question: How does Buy Now, Pay Later work?
settings.answer: Buy Now Pay Later involves splitting the total amount due for the purchase into four equal payments made after keen intervals of two weeks.

settings.question: Do international customers qualify for financing?
settings.answer: At the moment, this service is only extended to those who reside within the states. We, however, are undertaking measures to include more clients.

settings.all-sold-out-text: Please choose and update the products as per availability!
